txt.en: 'The time for fighting is over! Run!'
'There is no victory here! We have to run!'
'We are doing well, [placeholder]! Every second we give to Prince Théodred is a second unwasted! So long as we stand, Rohan stands with us!'
'They will be on us in moments, [placeholder]. Let me gather the men about us and ready them for this last assault.'

'A thousand curses upon Saruman! He sent a second force of uruks to the Ford on the other side of the river! We have to get back to the Prince at once! Without Cadda at the Ford, Prince Théodred cannot drive them off with the few men he has in his party!'
'We cannot die here! We have to get back to the Ford at once to save Prince Théodred! He will be caught between the hammer and the anvil of Saruman!'
'This is far enough, [placeholder]! Let us turn and face our pursuers! We must give Prince Théodred some time to move further south!'
Théodred's host has been driven back from the gates of Isengard in disarray, and pockets of Rohirrim are fighting for their lives as they retreat.
'Stand your ground, [placeholder]! We must buy the Prince what time we can!'
'Captain! A second force of uruks has come to the Ford in secret!'
'Cadda has been driven back into Rohan! Prince Théodred is in danger!'
Retreat south down the road with Grimbold
Face the pursuing forces with Grimbold
Fight off the attacking forces in order to buy Théodred precious time to retreat
Follow Grimbold through the chaos of battle
You have come down the road in retreat with Grimbold, and he has put up his hand to stop you.
You have retreated further down the road and are once more embroiled in the fighting. You must buy Théodred as much time as you can!
Grimbold has fought off his opponent and wants to speak with you while he catches his breath.
The men are disorganized and in chaos, and Grimbold wants to gather them together for one last stand.
A rider has brought disturbing news: a second force of uruks has left Isengard in secret and has driven the defending force at the Ford of Isen back into Rohan.
'We have to give Prince Théodred time to retreat, [placeholder]!'
'Gather to me! Saruman's hammer-stroke will soon be upon us!'
'Our Prince has gotten to safety, but we cannot allow this force to reach him!'
Instance: The Battle of the Ford, Afternoon
